name: ONE MILLION MARTYRS
description:
500 rioters face off against 500 Police officers. Use pipes, baseball bats, guns and molotov cocktails to batter your opponents into submission.

WASD to move and jump

Mouse to aim

Mouse1 to use your weapon.

ESC to quit to main menu.

One Million Martyrs is an unfinished prototype. I wrote all the code and created all the art by myself in 48 hours for the Southampton Game Jam, so expect a few bugs and for nothing to happen when you win the game...
